CustomField.formula:
CASE( aos_Sub_Status__c, "Attended - CC left", 3, "Attended – enquires continuing", 1, "Awaiting AWD Compliance Check", 2, "Awaiting Attendance", 3, "Awaiting Recheck", 1, "Covering Inspector -Assigned", 4, "Covering Inspector – Awaiting Attendance", 3, "Covering Inspector – Preliminary Enquiries Made", 3, "Notes outstanding", 1, "Pending Forfeiture Application", 1, "Pending Forfeiture decision", 0, "Pending FBOE", 1, "Pending FBOE Application Decision", 0, "Preliminary inquiries made", 3, "Prosecution Commenced", 0, "Trap Set", 0,
/* If no Sub_Status__c match, check animalos__Status__c */ CASE( animalos__Status__c, "Assigned", 4, "Awaiting Assignment", 0, "Finalised", 0, 0 ) )
CustomField.label: Status Points
